tweet: 73mm chrome juggling ball might just be too small for hdr light probe.  Taking suggestions for stand construction.
@creativebloke  weeks later, finally dropped a Modo render into Photomatix and got the same result.  Ever have any luck with that?
chrome juggling ball light probe might not cut it.  I didn't want to, but looks like Wal-Mart garden globe for me tomorrow.
